        JobManager.JobBuilder closeOnExit()
                           throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Description copied from interface: JobFactory.JobBuilder
        Request to automatically close the job when the object is dismissed or the virtual machine terminates.
        Specified by:

        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - Jobs managed by a JobManager are never automatically closed.
